summary: The diff adds a new SplashView component that displays the exact title text "TV STREAMING NETWORK" and integrates a new initial 'splash' view into App.tsx. TopNav is conditionally hidden while on the splash screen, and a button transitions the user into the existing Home view. Admin gating for the Manage view is preserved/strengthened via checks in navigation and an effect redirect.

hallucinated_features.description: Session-scoped persistence of splash dismissal via sessionStorage (splash shown only until dismissed for the current tab session).
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements specify showing a splash on first app load and that refresh while on splash keeps showing splash until continue, but do not request persisting dismissal state in session storage.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/alteration of an application footer that includes a caffeine.ai referral link.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about introducing a splash page and view flow changes; it does not request adding or changing a footer or external referral link.

hallucinated_features.description: Splash page includes an image logo asset reference at "/assets/generated/tv-streaming-network-logo.dim_512x512.png" and animated background elements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requires prominent display of the text "TV STREAMING NETWORK" and a continue action, but does not request adding a logo asset or background animations.
